summary: Tired of the nappy-like underwear in skyrim? Want to run naked through the woods? Then this is the mod for you!
descriptionHtml:
Tired of the nappy-like underwear in skyrim? Want to run naked through the woods? Then this is the mod for you!

This is a modified version of the original mesh for males, removing the underwear and adding a figleaf.

It will still work without the texture if you are already using a texture replacer, but the default underwear on the skin looks quite strange.

Update: Now with a large mesh, no longer breaks the weight scaling!

If you want dangly bits, go here: http://www.curse.com/mods/skyrim/nude-nord-males
or here: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1947
author: jajajajaja
